is the pioneer in virtualization and an innovator in cloud and business mobility A proven leader VMware allows customers to run manage connect and secure applications across clouds and devices in a common operating environmentbrbrThe Senior Manager WWRACE Delivery Operations is responsible for running the global Delivery and Enablement Operations team The WWRACE team delivers worldclass sales and technical training to support our sales teams and partners in accelerating VMwares growth The Delivery and Enablement Operations team is essential to program delivery working behind the scenes to schedule host and support execution The ideal candidate is comfortable bringing structure to ambiguity working on many programs at the same time and excited about leading a global teambrbrstrongJob
